The LibTIFF software provides support for the Tag Image File Format (TIFF), a widely used format for storing image data.
WebP codec is a library to encode and decode images in WebP format. This package contains the library that can be used in other programs to add WebP support
libxcb provides an interface to the X Window System protocol, which replaces the traditional Xlib interface
libxml2 is an XML toolkit implemented in C, originally developed for the GNOME Project
Libxslt is the XSLT C library developed for the GNOME project. XSLT itself is a an XML language to define transformation for XML

GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and other non-source files of a program from the program's source files

Tk is a graphical user interface toolkit that takes developing desktop applications to a higher level than conventional approaches
